reviews.sentence: Disappointment. Crappy Hotel Construction on hotel and main roads Noisy My friend and I will never stay at this hotel. The elevator smelled. Water trickeled out of the shower. The room was hot took a long while to cool down Crappy parking. I really think if Expedia uses this hotel or any other hotel the customer should be told about the construction on the hotel and the roads leading to the hotel. If I had known this My friend and I would have never stayed here. It was very unplesant we did not want to go back to our rooms. Also the area srounding the hotel was crappy too. The need to upgade this hotel. Nothing You had to go out of your way to get anywhere road construction made it difficult to get around especially if you are not familar with the area. Everything I said above.
Nice staff big room. Room had a fridge microwave. The bathrooms had ants crawling around the sink.

DAY 1. Flew into Bob Hope Airport then took advantage of the hotels shuttle service. Check in. had pizza delivered. DAY 2. Switched rooms because of the short shower head. Had the hotel shuttle take us to breakfast then we took a Lyft to Hollywood Blvd. Then took a Lyft to the observatory. Then another Lyft to Burbank Inn and Out Burger. We had the hotel shuttle pick us up from Inn and Out. DAY 3. Took the hotel shuttle to the bus station and went to Universal Studios. DAY 4. Had to take a Lyft to Bob Hope Airport because the shuttle service did not start until 630am. Clean Rooms Friendly staff excellent Burbank shuttle service. Hollywood Blvd Guines world records Wax Works Ripleys Believe it or Not Ron Hobord Life experience Universal Studios Observatory Earlier shuttle service to the airport. They are already working on it but taller shower heads in some rooms.

Easy going stay. In pretty good shape for an older inn. Still can probably use some updating. Housekeeping was excellent and fulfilled my requests. Wifi is my biggest complaint. I barely got a signal. Alas I survived by watching the tv instead of Netflix on my iPad. Close to the freeway which made it easy to get where I needed to go. Easy check in checkout.

Just a room. Reasonably priced. Clean room. Fridge did not get very cold. No coffee pot in room. Very nice hotel staff. Property around hotel under construction. Graffiti. We were next door to a loud hotel room party. Drunk guests walking around outside our door on the walkway. Security door from the parking lot did not close. Overall feel was a little unsafe. Not sure if I had stay there again.

I would not stay there again. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. The first room we had the air conditioning was broken and was very loud. They gave us another room that was bigger but was very old and seemed dirty. The toilet was running all night the bathtub was under repairs and there were roaches in the bathroom shower. In the morning we could not shower because of the roaches.
Acceptable. The carpet in the room was wet from shampooing. Terrible gross carpet stains. I could only find one ice machine that worked.

Worst hotel I have ever stayed in my life ants and roaches they have the wallpaper stapled to the wall they turn off the water without letting you know they turned off the water They do not serve continental breakfast I would not recommend that place to no one I do not even want to give it one star but I have no choice and I am pretty sure I am not the only one my other coworkers complained about this place too worst place on Earth to me right now they need to work on it the sinks got rust on them lack of communication with you when you walk through the door you do not get greeted you just get stared at by the front desk workers the males that is not the females they do greet you I would not recommend the Ramada in Burbank to no one.

Beds sheets and towels were clean and in good condition. Hotel staff were nice. Found a bug in the bathroom. Bed was not very comfortable loud springs. Quite noisy partly because it was near a freeway and because you could hear every hallway conversation inside the room. The upholstery in the chair was ripped.

I was charged 1340 for a room and the condition of my room was disgusting. The floors had dirt and debris and were n’t vacuumed. The room smelled like crack cocaine. The wall paper was peeling off from the wall the ceiling had dark mildew stains. The grout on the bathtub tile had mold and mildew. Some pieces of tile in the bathtub walls were broken and missing. The mattress was hard and concave. I can not believe they charge this much money for a place that is in utter disrepair. I can be thankful at least that the beds were made and had clean sheets. This place is horrible.
Rooms were clean and pool was very clean the kids enjoyed that. Breakfast was ok not bad.
Wi fi terrible. Wi fi is terrible. Slow with lots of drops. Breakfast is so so. do not even have a jug of water. Rooms are spacious and clean.
I had Stay Here Again. Room was a nice size with a seating area very clean with a very comfortable bed.
Nice rooms just needs better cable.
Liked bkfst included. Accessible room I had was newer and was great. Location great but see that parts of hotel still need updating to match other areas that have been renovated.
Very Happy. Great stay at this Ramada by Wyndham Burbank Airport. Room was quiet and clean bed very comfortable. Shuttle servicewas superb and fast. I would stay here again.
THE ROOM WAS VERY CLEAN AND COMFORTABLE.

Great value hotel close to downtown Burbank attractions at Universal Studios and Hollywood. Clean modern rooms with plenty of space and big bathroom with deep bath. Great free continental breakfast with fresh fruits breads muffins pastries yoghurts cereals juices and the good old pancake making machineThis hotel although next to the highway and there is a little noise from this is in an excellent location. All the attractions of Hollywood 22 mins away. Universal studios less than 15 mins. Great value and would definitely stay here again. Staff are very friendly and always willing to assist.
My parents stayed here bars on the windows are only on the first floor ITS GOOD TO KNOW IN ADVANCE FRIENDS.
Exceptional. The room was in great condition the staff was really friendly excellent customer service i give them a 10 of 10.
